meanings.definition: A sculptural relief or projection from a surface.
meanings.sent1: The artist carefully carved the rilievo into the marble.
meanings.sent2: The rilievo of the lion on the wall stood out beautifully.
meanings.sent3: The rilievo of the unicorn on the door seemed to come to life.
meanings.sent4: Her emotions were like a rilievo, rising and falling dramatically.
meanings.sent5: The rilievo of the tree on the sculpture was so detailed, it looked real.

meanings.definition: Prominence or distinctness in a design or pattern.
meanings.sent1: The bright colors added rilievo to the painting.
meanings.sent2: The rilievo of the flowers made them pop against the background.
meanings.sent3: The rilievo of the polka dots on the dress made it stand out.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter brought a rilievo of joy to the room.
meanings.sent5: The rilievo of the stars in the night sky was breathtaking.
